attributes.action: Allow exemption from the increase in tax on 4x4 vehicles for working vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is totally unfair that people owning a 4x4 for working purposes such as farmers or those living in remote areas that can be cut off by bad weather should be asked to pay the same high road tax rate as those owners who have 4x4 as a status symbol
